item.title: Masked Faces Recognition AI
item.description: This project will help me discover Deep Learning and Computer Vision. There is not much content yet, because we just started the project. But I will update this project page as things progress, so stay in touch !

item.title: Dots and Boxes AI
item.description: To evaluate the different AIs developed by each student of the class, a tournament is organized in which all the AIs will face each others. There is not much content yet, because I just started the project. But I will update this project page as things progress, so stay in touch !

item.title: Hospital Web Rehabilitation Platform
item.description: We used a MERN (MongoDB, Express JS, React JS and Node JS) Stack and I contributed to both the frontend and the backend. Patients coming from surgery can connect to this platform to realize several physical and psychosocial exercises per day in order to maintain a physical condition and keep their brain active. The exercises can take several formats : PDF documents video files audio files web videos link to applications Each morning during the first connection and each night before sleeping, patients have to fulfill a wellbeing form.

item.title: My Day
item.description: We divided the project in 3 parts : Frontend : creation of the web interface Backend : creation of the server Data : call to APIs and processing of the collecting data We used a MERN (MongoDB, Express JS, React JS and Node JS) Stack. As I was already familiar with React, I decided to be versatile and I contributed to both the backend and the data parts and I helped in the frontend when needed.
